description.value: Defines codes defined within the SDC implementation guide that are expected to migrate elsewhere in future releases

display.value: The Task is asking the owner to create an instance of the specified 'definition' resource that is the focus of the Task. E.g. Create a response for a Questionnaire, a Request instance for an ActivityDefinition, a CarePlan for a PlanDefinition, etc.
Identifies the base URL for FHIR servers to which the Questionnaire resulting from the Task should be POSTed
